Reference

All functions

enable_github_colors() disable_github_colors()

Enable/disable Colors on Github Actions

encode_string()

Encode String for Github Actions

octo_debug() octo_inform() octo_warn() octo_abort()

Signal conditions that create Github annotations.

octo_add_path()

Add a system path

octo_echo_on() octo_echo_off()

Echo workflow commands

octo_mask_value() octo_mask_envvar()

Masking a value or envvar in the GHA log.

octo_set_envvar()

Set environment variables

octo_set_output()

Set an output parameter

octo_start_group() octo_end_group()

Grouping log lines

octo_stop_commands() octo_start_commands()

Stop workflow commands

octocat()

"cat" a string if on Github

on_github()

Detect if R is running within a Github Action.
